kannada_original: ಬೀಜ ಬಿತ್ತುವ ಮೊದಲೆ ಮೆದೆ ಹಾಕಬೇಡ ನೀ ;
english_transliteration: Bīja bittuva modale mede hākabēḍa nī ;
english_translation: Do not pile up the heap (of harvest) before sowing the seed;
Do not tie a tassel to a banner that will not be raised.

kannada_original: ಕವಿತೆ ರಚಿಸಲು ಬೇಡ ಮಾತು ಮನ ಕೂಡದಿರೆ ;
english_transliteration: Kavite racisalu bēḍa mātu mana kūḍadire ;
english_translation: Do not attempt to create poetry if the words and mind do not meet;
Isn't it dance when they rejoice? – Muddu Rāma.
